    • vocabularyDescriptor

      public cz.cvut.kbss.jopa.model.descriptors.Descriptor vocabularyDescriptor(Vocabulary vocabulary)
      Creates a JOPA descriptor for a specific vocabulary.

      The descriptor specifies that the instance will correspond to the given model. It also initializes other required attribute descriptors.

      Parameters:
      vocabulary - Vocabulary for which the descriptor should be created
      Returns:
      Vocabulary descriptor

    • vocabularyDescriptor

      public cz.cvut.kbss.jopa.model.descriptors.Descriptor vocabularyDescriptor(URI vocabularyUri)
      Creates a JOPA descriptor for a vocabulary with the specified identifier.

      The descriptor specifies that the instance will correspond to the given IRI. It also initializes other required attribute descriptors.

      Parameters:
      vocabularyUri - Vocabulary identifier for which the descriptor should be created
      Returns:
      Vocabulary descriptor

      Returns:
